item.description:
Join us for a wonderful fundraiser for the Home for Little Wanderers at the elegant State Room (33rd floor of 60 State Street, with gorgeous views overlooking the city). This is a fabulous event (it sold out last year) and a great chance to get dressed up and have a blast helping a very important cause. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000. Event features:


• 4 Hour Sponsored Bar (complimentary cocktails!!)
• Food & Dessert Stations
• Music & Entertainment
 • Casino Gaming (Blackjack, Roulette, & Poker)
• Live Auction Items & Grand Prizes for most chips!

Tickets are $150 and must be purchased in advance. Please get your tickets at:

www.casinoroyale3-smile.eventbrite.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) in the event near the ticket area. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Casino Royale Fundraiser for the Home for Little Wanderers
